sub_topic: The chaotic behavior of the double pendulum
message_1: What is the maximum angle of deviation (in degrees) of the second pendulum from the vertical position after five complete swings of a double pendulum with given initial conditions (lengths and angles of both pendulums)?
message_2: To solve this problem, I need the initial conditions (lengths and angles of both pendulums). Please provide the values for the lengths and initial angles of both pendulums.
